prompt: Create a playful rating screen with a light blue background and a centered layout. At the top, place a circular app icon, 90x90 pixels, with a green-to-lime gradient and a white trophy icon. Add a bold 'Rate Us!' title in dark green, 32px font size. Include a centered descriptive text in dark gray, 16px font size, inviting users to rate. Show 5 interactive lime star icons in a horizontal row, each 44px in size. Below, include a wide, rounded green 'Send Rating' button and a transparent 'Later' button with a green border and text, both with 16px font size. Use a Column layout with 24px spacing for a fun, engaging design.
